channel.title: Rollerblade on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Rollerblade on Praveen Lobo

item.title: I tried roller blading
item.description: On the Sweetest Day of 2011, I just happened to visit the Incredi-Roll Skate & Laser Tag Family Fun Center (on Oklahoma) for some rollerblade fun. I always wanted to learn rollerblading. A friend of mine forced me to get into it for sometime before giving up on me. But this sweetest day, I gave it a try. It’s indoors so there’s no danger of getting run over by a truck.
